anya-e0105n29:1_0: Ācariyo pana imaṁ visuddhimaggapakaraṇaṁ yathāvuttappakārena katvā aññāpi tipiṭakaṭṭhakathāyo anukkamena akāsi. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0105n29:1_1: Samantapāsādikaṁ nāma vinayaṭṭhakathaṁ buddhasirittherena ajjhesito mahāvihārassa dakkhiṇabhāge padhānagharapariveṇe
anya-e0105n29:1_3: Sā panesā siripāloti nāmantarassa mahānāmarañño vīsatimavasse (973-bu-va) āraddhā ekavīsatimavasse (974-bu-va) niṭṭhānappattā ahosi.
anya-e0105n29:1_4: Tañca pana karonto mahāmahindattherenābhataṁ sīhaḷabhāsāya saṅkhataṁ mahāaṭṭhakathaṁ tassā sarīraṁ katvā
anya-e0105n29:1_5: mahāpaccarīkurundīsaṅkhepaandhakaṭṭhakathāhi ca gahetabbaṁ gahetvā sīhaḷadīpe yāva vasabharājakālā pākaṭānaṁ
anya-e0105n29:1_6: porāṇa vinayadharamahātherānaṁ vinicchayabhūtaṁ theravādampi pakkhipitvā akāsi.
anya-e0105n29:4_0: Vinicchayo aṭṭhakathāsu vutto, yo yuttamatthaṁ apariccajanto;
anya-e0105n29:5_0: Tatopi antogadhatheravādaṁ, saṁvaṇṇanaṁ samma samārabhissa”nti ca.
anya-e0105n29:23_0: Ekasaṁvacchareneva, yathā niṭṭhaṁ upāgatā”ti pari. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
anya-e0105n29:24_0: Ayañca samantapāsādikā vinayaṭṭhakathā adhunā mudditachaṭṭhasaṅgītipotthakavasena sahassato upari aṭṭhapaṇṇāsādhikatisatamattapiṭṭhaparimāṇā
anya-e0105n29:24_2: tassā ca ekasaṁvaccharena niṭṭhāpitattaṁ upanidhāya catuvīsādhikasattasatamattapiṭṭhaparimāṇo (724) visuddhimaggopi
anya-e0105n29:24_3: antamaso chappañcamāsehi niṭṭhāpito bhaveyyāti sakkā ñātuṁ.
anya-e0105n29:24_4: Tasmā yaṁ buddhaghosuppattiyaṁ mahāvaṁsavacanaṁ nissāya “visuddhimaggo ācariyabuddhaghosena ekaratteneva
anya-e0105n29:25_0: Nanu ca imissaṁ aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “sumaṅgalavilāsiniya”ntiādinā visesanāmavasena āgamaṭṭhakathānaṁ atideso dissati pārā. aṭṭha. 1.15,
anya-e0105n29:25_7: nigamane ca paṭhamaṁ sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyo sutvā karaṇappakāsanato ṭhapetvā visuddhimaggaṁ ayameva paṭhamaṁ katāti veditabbā.
anya-e0105n29:25_8: Visuddhimagge pana vinayaṭṭhakathāyanti vā vinayaṭṭhakathāsūti vā majjhimaṭṭhakathāsūti vā evaṁ sāmaññanāmavaseneva atideso dissati,
anya-e0105n29:25_13: 1.8 evaṁ aññamaññātideso pana ācariyassa manasā suvavatthitavasena vā sakkā bhavituṁ,
anya-e0105n29:25_15: Ācariyena hi visuddhimaggaṁ sabbaso niṭṭhāpetvā samantapāsādikādiṁ ekekamaṭṭhakathaṁ karonteneva yattha
anya-e0105n29:25_16: yattha atthavaṇṇanā vitthārato aññaṭṭhakathāsu pakāsetabbā hoti,
anya-e0105n29:25_17: tattha tattha “imasmiṁ nāma ṭhāne kathessāmī”ti manasā suvavatthitaṁ vavatthapetvā tañca atidisitvā yathāvavatthitaṭhānappattakāle
anya-e0105n29:25_18: taṁ vitthārato kathentena tā katā vā bhaveyyuṁ.
anya-e0105n29:25_19: Ekekissāya vā niṭṭhānāsannappattakāle taṁ ṭhapetvā aññañca aññañca tathā katvā sabbāpi apubbācarimaṁ
anya-e0105n29:25_20: pariniṭṭhāpitā bhaveyyunti evaṁ dvinnaṁ pakārānamaññataravasena ācariyassāṭṭhakathāsu aññamaññātideso
